name: Netguru
overview:
As of December 15, 2006, netGuru Inc. was acquired by BPO Management Services, LLC in a reverse merger transaction. netGuru, Inc., integrated Internet technology and services company, provides document centric collaborative software products and services, and embedded information technology (IT) services. Its eReview collaborative software enables a host and other participants to engage in real-time Web-based conferencing and document sharing anywhere and anytime in approximately 150 document formats. The company offers WebWorks software that provides project-based document and team management functions. The company offers collaborative software for manufacturing and architecture/engineering/construction projects; and for administration and human resources, government, finance, pharmaceuticals, and healthcare industries. netGuru also provides contracted IT services and software solutions to engineering, aerospace, e-commerce, semiconductors, finance, education, insurance, manufacturing, distribution, retail, government, pharmaceuticals, and healthcare markets. In addition, it offers engineering technical support to other noncompeting engineering software companies, as well as to steel detailing and fabrication companies. The company markets and sells engineering analysis and design software products through a network of branch offices, subsidiaries, and reseller channels; and IT services through print advertisements, direct mailings, and Internet portals.

netGuru was founded by Amrit K. Das in 1981. The company was formerly known as Research Engineers, Inc. and changed its name to netGuru, Inc. in 2000. netGuru is headquartered in Yorba Linda, California.
